 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַפְּתֹם‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַפְּתוֺם‎</span> (so editions: &gt; [[BDB#Gi|Gi]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] from [[BDB#MSS|MSS]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַפְּתֹס‎</span>) [[Ezra.4.13|Ezra 4:13]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַלְכִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎וְא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּהַנְוִק‎</span>; of uncertain meaning: [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] Naug<sup>JBW 1853, 156</sup> ***in the end*** (from Pahlavi <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***afdom,***</u></abbr> Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***end***); [[BDB#Scheft|Scheft]]<sup>79</sup> ***treasuries*** (from Zend <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pathm¹***</u></abbr>, plural of <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pathma***</u></abbr>, ***treasury***, √ <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***path***</u></abbr>, ***to fill up***), will endamage ***the treasuries*** of kings. [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֶצְבַּע‎</span>] see <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צכע‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַרְבַּע‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבע‎</span>.
